tweet: Anticipated Trezor hardware wallet integration into @monero is ready! The idea, popped in 2017, was developed by Dušan Klinec during 2018 and sent to the Monero team for review. The bug fixing is done, the wait is over. Enjoy using your Trezor with Monero!  https://t.co/t9msG8ZfC1
